title: Pixel 3a XL no ringtone from incoming calls
content:
I have a Pixel 3a XL purchased in March 2019. Last week my phone no longer ring from any incoming call (that includes mobile calling, Google Hangouts, Google Voice, and Google Duo). No sound for alarm also. However, it does vibrate in both situation. 

Below are list of things I tried and founding:
 The phone can play sound from YouTube
 Do-not-Distribute is disabled
 The phone is not on silent. All volumes are set to full\max
 Press power and volume keys together is disabled 
 Restarted the phone multiple time doesn't help
 Restarted the phone in safe mode doesn't help
 Factory reset (erase everything) doesn't help
 Factory reset + Safe mode doesn't help
No previous 3rd party software transferred back to the device after reset
 Change to different ringtone doesn't help
Change ringtone do not play any preview sound
Phone is in Android version 9
Bluetooth enabled or disabled doesn't make a different
When the phone is set to ringtone - It doesn't ring from incoming call
When the phone is set to ringtone + vibrate - It only vibrate from incoming call
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3a XL
